feed.title: MicroPython Extras - Board
feed.subtitle: Packages and modules for boards and peripherals

entry.title: MicroPython for Surenoo Guition W5 Round
entry.summary:
Follow the steps below to install MicroPython on your Surenoo Guition W5 Round ESP32S3 board from your browser. You can review or rebuild the source code using the project repo.

  • Connect board to PC using USB-C cable
  • Press the Connect button below and follow prompts (use serial port USB JTAG …
entry.content:
Follow the steps below to install MicroPython on your Surenoo Guition W5 Round ESP32S3 board from your browser. You can review or rebuild the source code using the project repo.

  • Connect board to PC using USB-C cable
  • Press the Connect button below and follow prompts (use serial port USB JTAG/serial debug unit)

Your browser does not support WebSerial You are not allowed to use this on HTTP

Web installation is thanks to the ESP Web Tools project.

entry.title: MicroPython for Seeed XIAO ESP32C3

Follow the steps below to install MicroPython on your Seeed Studio XIAO ESP32C3 board from your browser. You can review or rebuild the source code using the project repo.

  • Connect board to PC using USB-C cable
  • Depress the BOOT button and hold
  • Toggle RESET button
  • Release BOOT button
  • Press the …
entry.content:
Follow the steps below to install MicroPython on your Seeed Studio XIAO ESP32C3 board from your browser. You can review or rebuild the source code using the project repo.

  • Connect board to PC using USB-C cable
  • Depress the BOOT button and hold
  • Toggle RESET button
  • Release BOOT button
  • Press the Connect button below and follow prompts (use serial port USB JTAG/serial debug unit)

Web installation is thanks to the ESP Web Tools project.
